Uses of Package
org.microbean.event

  • Classes in org.microbean.event used by org.microbean.event
    Class
    Description
    EventListener
    An EventListener, an Aggregate, and an AttributedTyped that receives events.
    EventQualifiersMatcher
    A Matcher encapsulating CDI-compatible event qualifier matching rules.
    EventTypeList
    An immutable AbstractList of TypeMirrors that contains only legal event types, sorted in a specific manner.
    EventTypeMatcher
    An AbstractTypeMatcher encapsulating CDI-compatible event type matching rules.
    EventTypes
    A utility for working with event types.
